name: ROOMBA VACUUM
description:
This is a short game i made for the Wowie Jam 3.0

You play as a small roomba vacuum in a house, you gotta press buttons to open doors and get to the end of the 5 levels but doing so will take part of your energy so be careful to not press something if you don't have enough energy for it.

The sfx were made with sfxr and the music was made in a rush by my friend Mr0plague (he currently isn't on itch.io) and everything else was made with construct 3.

This is also my first game ever so it doesn't have that much quality

Originally i was going to make a timer to see how fast you could beat the game but i didn't have enough time to do that, so i'll add it sometime in a later update (probably)

Hope you like it!
